mapper.select: SELECT SEQ, ID, PAR_ID, TITLE, CONTENT, REF, STEP, DEPTH, READCOUNT, WDATE, DEL, RESULT FROM QNA ORDER BY REF DESC, STEP ASC
SELECT SEQ, ID, PAR_ID, TITLE, CONTENT, REF, STEP, DEPTH, READCOUNT, WDATE, DEL, RESULT FROM QNA WHERE ID=#{id} OR PAR_ID=#{id} ORDER BY REF DESC, STEP ASC
SELECT SEQ, ID, PAR_ID, TITLE, CONTENT, REF, STEP, DEPTH, READCOUNT, WDATE, DEL, RESULT FROM QNA WHERE SEQ=#{seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QNA (SEQ, ID, PAR_ID, TITLE, CONTENT, REF, STEP, DEPTH, READCOUNT, WDATE, DEL, RESULT) VALUES(SEQ_QNA.nextval,#{id}, 0,#{title},#{content}, (SELECT NVL(MAX(REF),0)+1 FROM QNA) ,0,0,0,SYSDATE,0,0)
mapper.update: UPDATE QNA SET STEP=STEP+1 WHERE REF=(SELECT REF FROM QNA WHERE SEQ=#{seq}) AND STEP>(SELECT STEP FROM QNA WHERE SEQ=#{seq})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QNA (SEQ, ID, PAR_ID, TITLE, CONTENT, REF, STEP, DEPTH, READCOUNT, WDATE, DEL, RESULT) VALUES(SEQ_QNA.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{par_id}, #{title}, #{content}, (SELECT REF FROM QNA WHERE SEQ=#{seq}), (SELECT STEP FROM QNA WHERE SEQ=#{seq})+1, (SELECT DEPTH FROM QNA WHERE SEQ=#{seq})+1, 0, SYSDATE, 0, 1)
